name: YONHAN Battery Charger 0-20A 12V/24V LiFePO4 Lead Acid Fully Automatic Battery Maintainer, Car Battery Trickle Charger Automotive w/Battery Repair, Winter Mode, for AGM, STD, Gel, Deep Cycle Batteries
short_description: [20A Suitable for LiFePO4 Lead-acid Battery Charger] 12V 20 Amp, 24V 10Amp 7-stage quick battery charger, Designed to charge, maintain and repair all 12-volt and 24-volt lead-acid automotive, LiFePO4, marine and deep-cycle batteries including AGM, GEL, EFB, SLA,Flooded(WET), Calcium in cars, truck, SUVs, ATV, motorcycle, snowmobile, lawn mower, boat, tractor, forklift, golf cart, etc. which is much faster than 10A or 6A automatic chargers.

[Winter Holiday Battery Trickle Charger]The car battery trickle charger features winter and summer modes with smart control to adapt to temperature changes and adjust the charging rate, preventing battery drain. It offers multiple protections, including reverse protection, a cooling system, overcurrent protection, fireproof materials, overcharge, and short circuit protection. These ensure safe charging, making it perfect for maintaining batteries over winter or during holidays.

[High-efficiency Pulse Repair] Built-in advanced battery REPAIR mode to help recover old/idle batteries and extend battery life. If the battery cannot be charged, please use repair mode. The high-frequency and low-frequency pulse technology has good repair and activation effects, Automatically enters trickle/float charging mode after fully charged, keep maintaining your batteries during this winter and more, leave batteries for holiday months and still brand new when you back. pls Note: It can not repair a totally dead battery.

[Brighter Screen Visualized Charging] Extra large LCD screen not only clear to see under the sunlight but also displays the charging and battery status; charge voltage and current, inside temperature, charge percentage, summer mode, winter mode, etc.

[3-in-1 Quick Battery Charger, A Must Have Car Emergency Accessory] AC input: 100-240V 50/60Hz, input power with load: max 300W, applicable battery's voltage: 12V/24V, output current: max 20A/10A. This portable car battery charger has overcharge protection, over current protection, a built-in cooling fan, overheating protection, reverse polarity protection, short circuit protection, sparks-free contact, etc., ensuring a safe and efficient charging process while extending your vehicle's battery life.

[Overall Charging Protections] The charging cable contains heat-resistant and oxidation-resistant copper wire, which is not easy to break. It has protection circuits such as overcharge/overvoltage/overcurrent/short circuit, with functions such as overcurrent protection, short circuit protection, reverse connection protection, overheat protection, overvoltage protection and undervoltage protection, ensuring a safe and efficient charging process while extending the battery life of your vehicle.

name: YONHAN Battery Charger 10-Amp 12V and 24V Fully-Automatic Smart Car Battery Charger, Battery Maintainer Trickle Charger, and Battery Desulfator with Temperature Compensation
short_description: [All in One, Keep your battery charged and your car ready to go] This compact yet powerful 10-Amp 12V/24V smart battery charger is a versatile all-in-one solution, functioning as a charger, maintainer, trickle charger, and desulfator. It works with all 12V and 24V lead-acid batteries, including AGM, GEL, SLA, and Flooded types, for vehicles like cars, trucks, SUVs, motorcycles, lawnmowers, and boats. Input line length：90cm, Output line length：65cm

[Your Ultimate Winter Car Battery Companion] This smart car battery trickle charger has winter and summer modes to adjust charging based on temperature, preventing battery drain. It includes safety features like reverse polarity protection, overcharge protection, and short circuit prevention, ensuring safe and reliable charging. Perfect for keeping your car battery charged during cold winters or long breaks.

[Enjoy Precision Charging, Your car deserves the best] This automotive battery charger has a backlit LCD that shows voltage, current, power percentage, temperature, and mode settings, making it easy to check your battery's health. It includes a thermal sensor to adjust charging, preventing overcharging in heat and undercharging in cold. The charger remembers your last mode and defaults to it after a power outage.

[Restore your Battery, Don't let a dead battery ruin your plans] This battery charger includes an advanced repair mode to revive old or idle batteries and extend their lifespan. Use repair mode if the battery won't charge normally. Its high and low-frequency pulse technology helps restore and activate batteries, but it won't work on completely dead, damaged, or lithium batteries.

Note: 1. Our product is a car battery charger that requires connection to a power outlet for operation.2. Before use, please carefully read the product manual and select the appropriate charging mode for your battery. 3. This car battery charger cannot charge batteries voltage below 0.3V or batteries that are already damaged. 4. Always check your battery's voltage before attempting to charge. 5. If the battery indicator icon on the charger's display is flashing empty, this indicates that no battery has been detected, and charging will not be possible.

[Trickle charge mode switch] If you want to trickle charge your battery, you can switch to motorcycle mode after the battery is fully charged. This mode is compatible with the voltage monitoring mode, which keeps the battery voltage at least 12V at all times, keep batteries stay charged for a long time.

name: NOCO Genius GENPRO10X2: 2-Bank, 20A Onboard Battery Charger - 10A Per Bank, 12V Waterproof Marine Charger with Overcharge Protection & Temperature Compensation – for Lead-Acid & Lithium Batteries
short_description: MEET THE GENPRO10X2 — 19% smaller and 33% more powerful than the GEN2. It’s our most compact and advanced onboard charger yet - engineered for peak performance in the harshest marine environments.
MULTIPLE BANKS — A two-bank onboard battery charger rated at 20 amps total - 10 amps per bank. Independently charge 12V batteries in marine, boat, starter, and deep-cycle systems.
CHARGING MODES — Selectable modes for each bank: 12V, 12V AGM, 12V Lithium, and 12V Repair Mode. Independently charge and maintain all types of lead-acid and lithium-ion batteries with precision.
ENJOY PRECISION CHARGING — An integrated thermal sensor adjusts charging based on ambient temperature, preventing overcharging in heat and undercharging in cold for optimal battery performance.
CHARGE DEAD BATTERIES — Charge batteries from as low as 1 volt, or use Force Mode to manually begin charging batteries down to zero volts to recover deeply discharged or neglected batteries.
REDEFINED MOUNTING — A simplified mounting system allows for fast, secure installation in any orientation - even upside down - with an integrated anti-vibration backing to isolate shock and noise.

DESIGNED FOR WATER — A fully-sealed onboard charger rated IP68 for waterproof protection. Survives brutal life cycle testing, including thousands of hours underwater in the harshest marine conditions.

WHAT’S IN THE BOX — GENPRO10X2 20A 2-bank onboard charger with 72-inch DC cables and 3/8-inch eyelets, 72-inch AC cable (Type-B), and two mounting screws. Backed by a 3-year warranty and engineered in the USA.
product_description: The NOCO GENPRO10X2 is a rugged, fully-sealed onboard battery charger rated at 20 amps total—10 amps per bank—designed to charge and maintain two 12-volt batteries independently. Compatible with both lead-acid and lithium-ion batteries, including flooded, AGM, gel, and LiFePO₄ chemistries, it’s 27% smaller and 19% more powerful than the previous-generation GEN2, offering unmatched charging performance in a compact footprint. Each bank functions independently, allowing you to charge different battery types or conditions at the same time with selectable modes: 12V, AGM, Lithium, and Repair Mode. An integrated thermal sensor ensures optimal performance by adjusting the charge based on ambient temperature, preventing overcharging in heat and undercharging in cold weather. Force Mode lets you manually initiate charging on batteries as low as zero volts—ideal for reviving heavily discharged or neglected systems that would otherwise go undetected. With an IP68 rating and brutal life cycle testing under extreme marine conditions, the GENPRO10X2 is built for reliability on the water or in the field. Its reengineered mounting system enables secure installation in any position—even upside down—with an integrated anti-vibration base that reduces shock and noise. The GENPRO10X2 includes 72-inch DC cables with 3/8-inch eyelets, a 72-inch Type-B AC cable, two mounting screws, and a user guide. It is backed by a 3-year warranty, engineered in the USA, and certified to UL1236, ISO 8846, and 33 CFR 183.410 to meet demanding marine and ignition safety standards.

name: 6V and 12V Car Battery Charger, 15A Smart Battery Trickle Charger Maintainer, Pulse Repair Deep Cycle Battery Charger Automotive Desulfator for Car Motorcycle Truck Boat Lawn Mower Lead Acid Batteries
short_description: 【Wide Range of Applications】This 15 Amp battery charger automotive is designed for 6V/12V lead-acid automotive, marine, VRLA and maintenance-free, and deep-cycle batteries, including flooded, GEL, AGM, EFB batteries with battery capacity 6Ah-200Ah. It's not only a battery charger, trickle charger, float charger, battery desulfator, also an advanced battery maintainer,Cargador de batería 6V 12V. It will charge and maintain for cars, trucks, RV, SUV, Motorcycles, tricycles,lawn mowers,marine,motorboats, golf cart, 6V toy cars, snowmobiles,etc.

【Fully Automatica Intelligent Battery Charger】This auto battery charger tender owns 8-Stage charging process, automatically detects whether your battery requires 6 volt or 12 volt charging, it charges the battery quickly and accurately, Charges fully then go into float mode to maintain your battery without worry of overcharge. Input: 100-240V AC,operating temperature range (-20℃ to 40℃)

【Two Charging Mode & Repair Function】Car Mode(Quick charge 6V/12V battery 32Ah-200Ah);Motorcycle Mode(Slow charge 6V/12V battery 6Ah-32Ah).Automatically detect battery sulfation and acid stratification,auto repair and slow pulse current charging devulcanize battery to restore the battery lost performance, provides stronger engine starts and extended battery life.

【 Multi Safety Protections】Built in 6 stage charging protections guards against reverse polarity, over-current,short circuit, overload protection, over-voltage and over temperature protection. Adopt rustless shell and durable pure copper cord, built-in silent cooling fan offers high efficient heat dissipation and energy saving, all this avoid overcharge and discharge in hot summer and under-charging in cold winter.

【Easy Charging with No-worry Service】Very simple steps, this robust car battery charger makes charging easy for most types of gas and diesel vehicles, the LCD will display cleary of the battery charging percentage.We provide 24 months quality after-sale service. If you have any questions, please contact us anytime,we will reply to you soonest with a satisfactory solution.

name: NOCO GENIUS10: 10A 6V/12V Smart Battery Charger – Automatic Maintainer, Trickle Charger & Desulfator with Overcharge Protection & Temperature Compensation – For Lead-Acid & Lithium Batteries
short_description: MEET THE GENIUS10 — Similar to our G7200, just better. It's 17% smaller and delivers over 115% more power. It's the all-in-one charging solution - battery charger, battery maintainer, trickle charger, plus desulfator.

DO MORE WITH GENIUS — Designed for 6-volt and 12-volt lead-acid (AGM, Gel, SLA, VRLA) and lithium-ion (LiFePO4) batteries, including flooded, maintenance-free, deep-cycle, marine and powersport batteries.

ENJOY PRECISION CHARGING — An integrated thermal sensor dynamically adjusts the charge based on ambient temperature, preventing overcharging in hot weather and undercharging in cold, ensuring optimal battery performance.

CHARGE DEAD BATTERIES — Charge batteries from as low as 1 volt, or use Force Mode to manually charge completely dead batteries down to zero volts. Perfect for recovering deeply discharged or neglected batteries.

BEYOND MAINTENANCE — Keep your battery fully charged without worrying about overcharging. Our smart charger constantly monitors the battery, allowing you to leave it connected safely - indefinitely - for worry-free maintenance.

RESTORE YOUR BATTERY — Precision pulse charging automatically detects and reverses battery sulfation and acid stratification, restoring your battery's health for improved performance and extended lifespan.

COMPATIBLE — Charges and maintains all types of vehicles, including cars, automobiles, motorcycles, mopeds, lawn mowers, ATVs, UTVs, tractors, trucks, SUVs, RVs, campers, trailers, boats, PWCs, jet skis, classic cars, and more..

WHAT'S IN THE BOX — Includes a 10A charger, 72-inch AC cable, 80-inch DC cable with battery clamps, and integrated eyelet terminals, mounting bracket, screws, and a 3-year warranty. Proudly designed in the USA.
product_description: The GENIUS10 is the ultimate all-in-one solution for battery charging, maintenance, and restoration, delivering 17% more power in a 115% smaller design compared to its predecessor, the G7200. Designed for 6-volt and 12-volt lead-acid (AGM, gel, flooded, and deep-cycle) and lithium-ion (LiFePO4) batteries (up to 230 amp-hours), it is compatible with a vast array of vehicles, such as cars, automobiles, motorcycles, dirt bikes, scooters, mopeds, lawn mowers, ATVs, UTVs, tractors, trucks, SUVs, RVs, campers, trailers, boats, PWCs, jet skis, snowmobiles, golf carts, classic cars, and more; including automotive brands like BMW, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche, Bentley, Maserati, Lexus, Audi, Ford, Chevrolet, Corvette, Cadillac, Prius, Toyota, Subaru, Nissan, powersport vehicles such as Harley-Davidson, Honda, Yamaha, Kawasaki, Ducati, Indian, KTM, Husqvarna, Vespa, Polaris, Seadoo, as well as lawn and garden vehicles such as John Deere, Kubota, Toro and more. Featuring an integrated thermal sensor, the GENIUS10 adjusts its charging profile based on ambient temperature, ensuring optimal performance by eliminating the risk of overcharging in hot climates and undercharging in cold ones. It's capable of charging batteries as low as 1 volt and offers a Force Mode for manually charging completely dead batteries (as low as zero volts). With precision pulse charging, the GENIUS10 restores battery health by reversing sulfation and acid stratification, improving performance and extending battery life. Its advanced monitoring system allows for safe, indefinite connection, making it perfect for long-term maintenance. The package includes a 10A charger (120-240VAC), 72-inch AC cable, 80-inch DC cable with battery clamps, and integrated eyelet terminals, mounting bracket and screws, all backed by a three-year warranty. Proudly designed in the USA, the GENIUS10 combines power, reliability, and convenience in a compact design to keep your batteries ready for whatever lies ahead.

short_description: MEET THE GEN5X3 — 37% smaller and 43% more powerful than the GENM3. It’s our most compact and advanced onboard charger yet—engineered for peak performance in the harshest marine environments.
MULTIPLE BANKS — A three-bank onboard battery charger rated at 15 amps total - 5 amps per bank. Independently charge 12V batteries in marine, boat, starter, and deep-cycle systems.
CHARGING MODES — Selectable modes for each bank: 12V, 12V AGM, 12V Lithium, and 12V Repair Mode. Independently charge and maintain all types of lead-acid and lithium-ion batteries with precision.
ENJOY PRECISION CHARGING — An integrated thermal sensor adjusts charging based on ambient temperature, preventing overcharging in heat and undercharging in cold for optimal battery performance.
CHARGE DEAD BATTERIES — Charge batteries from as low as 1 volt, or use Force Mode to manually begin charging batteries down to zero volts to recover deeply discharged or neglected batteries.

DESIGNED FOR WATER — A fully-sealed onboard charger rated IP68 for waterproof protection. Survives brutal life cycle testing, including thousands of hours underwater in the harshest marine conditions.

WHAT’S IN THE BOX — GEN5X3 15A 3-bank onboard charger with 72-inch DC cables and 3/8-inch eyelets, 72-inch AC cable (Type-B), and two mounting screws. Backed by a 3-year warranty and engineered in the USA.
product_description: The NOCO GEN5X3 is a fully-sealed, waterproof onboard battery charger rated at 15 amps total—5 amps per bank—designed for 12-volt lead-acid and lithium-ion batteries, including flooded, AGM, gel, and LiFePO₄ chemistries. It’s 37% smaller and delivers 43% more power than the previous-generation GENM3, making it our most compact and advanced charger yet. Each bank operates independently, allowing you to precisely charge and maintain three batteries simultaneously, even if they differ in type or condition. Selectable charging modes—12V, AGM, Lithium, and Repair Mode—offer tailored charging for battery health and longevity, while an integrated thermal sensor automatically adjusts charging in hot and cold climates to prevent overcharging or undercharging. For severely discharged batteries, Force Mode lets you manually begin charging from zero volts, a critical advantage for recovering deeply neglected batteries that other chargers can’t detect. Engineered for the harshest marine environments, the GEN5X3 features an IP68 rating and has endured brutal life cycle testing, including thousands of hours underwater. Installation is fast and secure in any orientation—even upside down—thanks to a redesigned mounting system with an integrated anti-vibration backing that isolates shock and noise. The GEN5X3 comes with 72-inch DC cables with 3/8-inch eyelets, a 72-inch Type-B AC cable, two mounting screws, and a user guide. It’s backed by a 3-year warranty, engineered in the USA, and certified to UL1236, ISO 8846, and 33 CFR 183.410 for safety, ignition protection, and marine compliance.

name: 12V 10A Lithium Battery Charger 14.6V LiFePO4 Battery Charger Smart Charger with Anderson Connector Indicator Special for Lithium LiFePO4 Deep Cycle Rechargeable Batteries of Boat, RV
